name: The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, Trustee v. Jeffrey J. MAURO et al.
name_abbreviation: Bank of N.Y. Mellon v. Mauro

parties:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, Trustee
v.
Jeffrey J. MAURO et al.
attorneys: The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 295, 172 A.3d 303 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, Trustee
v.
Jeffrey J. MAURO et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided December 14, 2017
Kenneth A. Volre, in support of the petition.
Zachary Grendi, in opposition.
The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 295, 172 A.3d 303 (2017), is denied.
